javacsw.services.cs

Interface IBlockingConfigManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JBlockingConfigManager, JBlockingConfigServiceClient

    public interface IBlockingConfigManager
    Defines a synchronous (blocking) java interface for storing and retrieving configuration information

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • create

        ConfigId create(java.io.File path,
                ConfigData configData,
                java.lang.Boolean oversize,
                java.lang.String comment)
        Creates a config file with the given path and data and optional comment. An IOException is thrown if the file already exists.
        Parameters:
        path - the config file path
        configData - the contents of the file
        oversize - true if the file is large and requires special handling (external storage)
        comment - a comment to associate with this file
        Returns:
        a unique id that can be used to refer to the file

      • update

        ConfigId update(java.io.File path,
                ConfigData configData,
                java.lang.String comment)
        Updates the config file with the given path and data and optional comment. An FileNotFoundException is thrown if the file does not exists.
        Parameters:
        path - the config file path
        configData - the contents of the file
        comment - a comment to associate with this file
        Returns:
        a unique id that can be used to refer to the file

      • createOrUpdate

        ConfigId createOrUpdate(java.io.File path,
                        ConfigData configData,
                        java.lang.Boolean oversize,
                        java.lang.String comment)
        Creates a config file with the given path and data and optional comment, or updates it, if it already exists.
        Parameters:
        path - the config file path
        configData - the contents of the file
        oversize - true if the file is large and requires special handling (external storage)
        comment - a comment to associate with this file
        Returns:
        a unique id that can be used to refer to the file

      • get

        java.util.Optional<IBlockingConfigData> get(java.io.File path)
        Gets and returns the config file stored under the given path, if found.
        Parameters:
        path - the configuration path
        Returns:
        an optional object containing the configuration data, if found

      • get

        java.util.Optional<IBlockingConfigData> get(java.io.File path,
                                            ConfigId id)
        Gets and returns the config file stored under the given path, if found.
        Parameters:
        path - the configuration path
        id - id used to specify a specific version to fetch (default: latest)
        Returns:
        an optional object containing the configuration data, if found

      • get

        java.util.Optional<IBlockingConfigData> get(java.io.File path,
                                            java.util.Date date)
        /** Gets the file as it existed on the given date. If date is before the file was created, the initial version is returned. If date is after the last change, the most recent version is returned. If the path does not exist in the repo, an empty value is returned.
        Parameters:
        path - the file path relative to the repository root
        date - the target date
        Returns:
        an object that can be used to access the file's data, if found

      • exists

        boolean exists(java.io.File path)
        Returns true if the given path exists and is being managed
        Parameters:
        path - the configuration path
        Returns:
        true if the file exists

      • delete

        void delete(java.io.File path)
        Deletes the given config file (older versions will still be available)
        Parameters:
        path - the configuration path

      • delete

        void delete(java.io.File path,
            java.lang.String comment)
        Deletes the given config file (older versions will still be available)
        Parameters:
        path - the configuration path
        comment - comment for the delete operation

      • list

        java.util.List<ConfigFileInfo> list()
        Returns a list containing all known configuration files
        Returns:
        a list containing one ConfigFileInfo object for each known config file

      • history

        java.util.List<ConfigFileHistory> history(java.io.File path)
        Returns a list of all known versions of a given path
        Parameters:
        path - the relative path in the repo
        Returns:
        a list containing one ConfigFileHistory object for each version of path

      • setDefault

        void setDefault(java.io.File path,
                java.util.Optional<ConfigId> id)
        Sets the "default version" of the file with the given path. If this method is not called, the default version will always be the latest version. After calling this method, the version with the given Id will be the default.
        Parameters:
        path - the file path relative to the repository root
        id - an optional id used to specify a specific version (by default the id of the latest version is used)

      • resetDefault

        void resetDefault(java.io.File path)
        Resets the "default version" of the file with the given path to be always the latest version.
        Parameters:
        path - the file path relative to the repository root

      • getDefault

        java.util.Optional<ConfigData> getDefault(java.io.File path)
        Gets and returns the default version of the file stored under the given path. If no default was set, this returns the latest version.
        Parameters:
        path - the file path relative to the repository root
        Returns:
        an object that can be used to access the file's data, if found
